title: General Retail Price Index in the National Capital Region (2000=100) : August 2015 (PSA - ...
text: ( Source : PSA - Philippine Statistics Authority ) The annual growth of the General Retail Price Index (GRPI) in the National Capital Region ( NCR ) slowed down to 0.4 percent in August. It recorded a 1.0 percent gain last month and in August
